title: No labels for Annie
creator_credit: Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group and Stephen Skok
brief_description: A portrait of Annette Duras, a young woman whose life has become enriched and meaningful since obtaining a job in “open employment”. The program highlights the need for us to resist categorising others with destructive labels and illustrates the positive effect on people when labels are discarded.
